multiple_choice.question: Why did Demane and Demazane run away from their uncle's house?
choices: because they wanted to go to the city
because they wanted to see the circus
because they wanted to eat ice cream

multiple_choice.question: Where did Demane and Demazane stay in the forest?
Who grabbed Demazane from the cave?

fill_in_the_blanks.question: The swallows can enter it. It has two holes
As she was being carried away, she dropped some ashes here and there along the path
Demane replaced the bag with his own bag full of bees

meanings.porridge: a dish consisting of cereal boiled in water or milk
meanings.swallow: a migratory songbird with a forked tail and long pointed wings
meanings.cave: a natural underground chamber in a hillside or cliff
meanings.argue: give reasons or cite evidence in support of an idea

meanings.trap: a device or enclosure designed to catch and retain animals
meanings.promise: a declaration or assurance that one will do something
meanings.howl: a loud cry of pain, fear, anger, or amusement
meanings.honey: a sweet, sticky yellowish-brown fluid made by bees
